channel.title: [PI] Increase Pvp Points [PI] also pvp point slayer task doubler [PI] Rep++
channel.description:
Hey ppl, For a dumb reason i forgot how to increase Pvp points for ea kill =$
also there is a pvp slayer task, if u finish that u get double pvp points. can someone also tell me how to increase them :/ for real i forgot how to do this
i will rep++

item.title: [PI] Increase Pvp Points [PI] also pvp point slayer task doubler [PI] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

PlayerAssistant.java, Ctrl + F for pkPoint and if you find something like c.pkPoint +1; change to the amount you want. Its either PA or Client.java

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Increase Pvp Points [PI] also pvp point slayer task doubler [PI] Rep++
